page.title: 15TWO SPORTS GROUNDS
page.content:
EDGWARE SPORTS GROUND The grounds cover 22 acres in the north-east of our area. They are used for athletics, football, hockey, tennis and rugby. Watford Football Club uses the grounds for training 4 days a week, They are also used by North London Polytechnic regularly and by various other organisations. Adults belonging to the tennis club are charged Â£50 p.a. and children Â£15p.a. A survey of local residents showed that 50% make use of the facilities. 25% of those interviewed thought the charges were too high.
CHANDOS RECREATION GROUND The grounds cover 27 acres and are hired to several clubs. A local school uses them in the summer. There are 3 football pitches in all.75% of those interviewed use "The Rec".
